paper_abstract: This paper is the guest editors message to the Special Issue on Parallel Evolutionary Algorithms on Grid and Cloud. Although this special issue includes extended version of selected papers presented at the last three EvoPar Conferences, the reviewing and selection process was made under a strict peer reviewing process and after a call for papers open for submission from out of the conference. We briefly introduce the accepted papers in this message.
paper_title: Parallel Bioinspired Algorithms on the Grid and Cloud
